failures.unknownPermissionRequest: An error occurred while requesting permission.

denied.title: @:permissions.type Permission Denied
denied.description: @:permissions.type is required to proceed. Please consider enabling it in your settings.

permanentlyDenied.title: @:permissions.type Permission Permanently Denied
permanentlyDenied.description: @:permissions.type is required but has been permanently denied. Please enable it from app settings.

restricted.title: @:permissions.type Permission Restricted
restricted.description: Access to @:permissions.type is restricted by system policies or parental controls.

limited.title: @:permissions.type Permission Limited
limited.description: You have granted limited @:permissions.type access. If you want to allow full access, please adjust in your settings.

provisional.title: Provisional @:permissions.type Permission
provisional.description: The app is provisionally authorized. Some features might be limited.
